description: This file contains CSS styles for managing themes and layout for the tic-tac-toe web application's front end.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with center-aligned text and dynamic background color based on the selected theme.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including animation for spinning when motion is not reduced.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application, designed as a flex container to center align its content.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Style for links within the application, defining color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, styled with positioning, color, and transitions.
